analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/23/0xe52bc4074a6971019f4e514bac53c1816b5bb229.sol#132-133) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/23/0xe52bc4074a6971019f4e514bac53c1816b5bb229.sol#137-139)

TokensSpreader.spread (/unique_chucks/23/0xe52bc4074a6971019f4e514bac53c1816b5bb229.sol#299-310) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(sender,addresses[i],amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/23/0xe52bc4074a6971019f4e514bac53c1816b5bb229.sol#309)

TokensSpreader.spread has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transferFrom(sender,addresses[i],amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/23/0xe52bc4074a6971019f4e514bac53c1816b5bb229.sol#309)

BasicToken.totalSupply_ should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0xe52bc4074a6971019f4e514bac53c1816b5bb229.sol#132-133)
TokensSpreader.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0xe52bc4074a6971019f4e514bac53c1816b5bb229.sol#293-294)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0xe52bc4074a6971019f4e514bac53c1816b5bb229.sol#38-47) should be declared external
